name: DaCapo Delivers
description:
Set in the 1930s, in a nameless city very much like Chicago, you play as Sal DaCapo, a young man with ambitions. Start by supplying groceries to Mom and Pop's Pasta Place and Speakeasy while you case the scene. Don't be deceived by the first training levels, you'll be speeding along juggling your money and stock soon enough. An aspiring mob boss needs an incredible amount of supplies to support his mob and his gold-digger girlfriend, and there's only limited time to do it or go broke.
Supported Aspect Ratios: 16:10, 16:9
